title: PlotSquared 如何开启自然刷怪
author: gongziyin
txt_content: PlotSquared 如何开启自然刷怪

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
服务端\plugins\PlotSquared\config\worlds.yml
找到需要开启刷怪的世界
    event:
      spawn:
        egg: false
        breeding: false
        custom: true
    natural_mob_spawning: false
    mob_spawner_spawning: false
这些false全都改为true

replies.author: sgoye
replies.txt_content:
去地皮世界输入
/gamerule mobspawning true
话说地皮世界干嘛开刷怪
